an10.99:2.1: Durabhisambhavāni hi kho → durabhisambhavāni kho (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an10.99:2.6: uplavissati vā’ti → uppilavissati vā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an10.99:6.2: vaṅkakaṃ → vaṅkaṃ (si, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ciṅgulakaṃ → piṅgulikaṃ (sya-all); ciṅkulakaṃ (mr)
an10.99:8.1: Idha kho pana vo → idaṃ padaṃ sya-all potthakesu natthi; voti nipātamattaṃ (aṭṭha.)
